com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon
Interface MonitorNotifier

All Known Subinterfaces:
BootstrapNotifier, ProximityKitNotifier
public interface MonitorNotifier

This interface is implemented by classes that receive iBeacon monitoring notifications

See Also:
IBeaconManager.setMonitorNotifier(MonitorNotifier notifier), IBeaconManager.startMonitoringBeaconsInRegion(Region region), Region

Field Summary
static int INSIDE
          Indicates the Android device is inside the Region of iBeacons
static int OUTSIDE
          Indicates the Android device is outside the Region of iBeacons
 
Method Summary
 void didDetermineStateForRegion(int state, Region region)
          Called with a state value of MonitorNotifier.INSIDE when at least one iBeacon in a Region is visible.
 void didEnterRegion(Region region)
          Called when at least one iBeacon in a Region is visible.
 void didExitRegion(Region region)
          Called when no iBeacons in a Region are visible.
 

Field Detail

INSIDE

static final int INSIDE
Indicates the Android device is inside the Region of iBeacons

See Also:
Constant Field Values

OUTSIDE

static final int OUTSIDE
Indicates the Android device is outside the Region of iBeacons

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

didEnterRegion

void didEnterRegion(Region region)
Called when at least one iBeacon in a Region is visible.

Parameters:
region - a Region that defines the criteria of iBeacons to look for

didExitRegion

void didExitRegion(Region region)
Called when no iBeacons in a Region are visible.

Parameters:
region - a Region that defines the criteria of iBeacons to look for

didDetermineStateForRegion

void didDetermineStateForRegion(int state,
                                Region region)
Called with a state value of MonitorNotifier.INSIDE when at least one iBeacon in a Region is visible. Called with a state value of MonitorNotifier.OUTSIDE when no iBeacons in a Region are visible.

Parameters:
state - either MonitorNotifier.INSIDE or MonitorNotifier.OUTSIDE
region - a Region that defines the criteria of iBeacons to look for
